Consistent help

For systems that provide help, people may need the help to be in a consistent location and use consistent interactions.

Comment on this item

Mappings

Required abilityAccessibility characteristicSupport needed
Attention and concentrationHelp and instructionsDefault
Executive functionsHelp and instructionsDefault
MemoryHelp and instructionsDefault

References

  • Reference: 3.4.4. Consistent Help
  • Reference: 2-4-c to have a recognised mechanism (e.g. a help key or a phone menu using "0") that provides detailed help on the interaction in the context the user is in (what to press next)
  • Reference: 3.2.6 Consistent Help
